CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 25, 1957, pg. A17 reads: "Charmers Smile...happily during the AKA Deb Cotillion, and they are Constance Bernice Powell, Marva Paulette Jones, Joann Stotts and Judith Marylin Loftin."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five young women wearing light colored evening gowns and gloves, including possibly Barbara Charles, seated on right, and Judith Loftin, standing on right, posed in Penn Sheraton Hotel for the Alpha Kappa Alpha 1957 Cotillion
